title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Design Strategies for Performance Viewing Experiences to Promote Artistic Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of cultural arts planning or education fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design pre-performance preparation learning (art form education, goal-setting for viewing).
Learners can develop customized pre-educational materials considering diverse learner groups (students with disabilities, multicultural learners, etc.).
Learners can apply project-based assessment tools to evaluate engagement after performance viewing and encourage sustained artistic participation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
